sentences.sContent: I know a number of parents have rung the headteacher about what has happened but I would appeal for everyone to be calm, particularly in relation to those people involved.
sentences.sContent_eng: I know a number of parents have rung the headteacher about what has happened but I would appeal for everyone to be calm, particularly in relation to those people involved.
sentences.sCn: 我知道一些家长正围着校长问事情发生的经过，但我呼吁大家要保持冷静，特别是在那些跟这件事有直接关系的人。
